column4: If someone is free, I could use a bit of help getting past a significant issue
you should post your issue, know will know if they can help you untill we all know your problem
then post all on one line, if it's a log, paste it too www.pastebin.com then post the link here

you need to learn how to use irc before anyone can help you, i cannot follow you if you dont 1) post my name in front of each message so i SEE they're for me. 2) dont use enter as period. and 3) paste all logs/errors to a pastebin
